title: Marine English Communication Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of English grammar and vocabulary, along with general knowledge of maritime operations
context.additional_context: A vocational training program focusing on acquiring practical English communication skills required for ship navigation, utilizing personal devices (BYOD) in an online real-time environment.

learning_goals: Accurately use over 50 essential English expressions encountered in daily navigation tasks
Apply International Maritime Organization (IMO) standard communication protocols to convey risk messages during safety/emergency situations
Conduct inter-departmental (deck/machinery) operational coordination dialogues with over 80% accuracy through role-play simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
